link:linkbase.xsi:schemaLocation: http://www.xbrl.org/2003/linkbase http://www.xbrl.org/2003/xbrl-linkbase-2003-12-31.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/generic http://www.xbrl.org/2008/generic-link.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/boolean http://www.xbrl.org/2008/boolean-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/formula http://www.xbrl.org/2008/formula.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/assertion/consistency http://www.xbrl.org/2008/consistency-assertion.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/assertion/existence http://www.xbrl.org/2008/existence-assertion.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/assertion/value http://www.xbrl.org/2008/value-assertion.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/variable http://www.xbrl.org/2008/variable.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/period http://www.xbrl.org/2008/period-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/concept http://www.xbrl.org/2008/concept-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/tuple http://www.xbrl.org/2008/tuple-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/dimension http://www.xbrl.org/2008/dimension-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/general http://www.xbrl.org/2008/general-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/label http://www.xbrl.org/2008/generic-label.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/validation http://www.xbrl.org/2008/validation.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/unit http://www.xbrl.org/2008/unit-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2010/message http://www.xbrl.org/2010/generic-message.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/match http://www.xbrl.org/2008/match-filter.xsd

generic:link.msg:message: "Paid-up equity capital" = "Ordinary Shares" + "Cumulative Convertible Preference Shares" + "Preference (Convertible & Non-convertible)"

"Reserves and Surplus" = "Capital Reserve" + "Debenture Redemption Reserve" + "Share Premium" + "General Reserves" + "Statutory/Special Reserve (Section 45-IC reserve to be shown separately below item no.(vi))"+ "Reserves under Sec 45-IC of RBI Act 1934" + "Other reserves" + "Revaluation Reserves" + "Balance of profit and loss account"
"Secured Borrowings" = "Debenture" + "Deferred credits" + "Borrowings from Banks" + "Borrowings from FIs" + "Other Borrowings" +"Interest accrued but not due on the above"

"Un-Secured Borrowings" = "Borrowings from relatives of promoters / directors" + "Inter-corporate borrowings" + "Borrowings from Banks" + "Borrowings from FIs" + "Commercial paper" + "Debentures not in the nature of public deposit" + "Money received by way of caution money, margin money from the borrowers, lessee, hires or by way of security or advance from agents in the course of company's business or advance received against orders for supply of goods or properties or for rendering services" + "Subordinated debts" + "Borrowings from Holding Companies" + "Other Borrowings" + "Interest accrued but not due on the above"
"Current liabilities" = "Short-term borrowings" + "Trade payables" + "Liabilities to Subsidiaries & Holding Companies" + "Deferred Tax Liabilities (Net)" + "Others"
"Provisions" = "For taxation" + "For contingencies" + "For pension, gratuity and similar staff benefit schemes" + "Proposed dividends" + "Others"
"Total Liabilities" = "Paid-up capital" + "Reserves and Surplus" + "Secured Borrowings" + "Un-Secured Borrowings" + "Current liabilities" + "Provisions"
"Loans and Advances" = "Loans to Corporates" + "Inter-Corporate Deposits" + "Bills Purchased & Discounted" + "Others"
"Investments Profile (As per AS-13)" = "Long-term Investments" + "Current Investments"
"Long-term Investments" = "Government securities and government guaranteed bonds" + "Equity shares" + "Preference shares" + "Debentures and bonds" + "Units of mutual funds" + "Others"

"Current Investments" = "Government securities and government guaranteed bonds" + "Equity shares" + "Preference shares" + "Debentures and bonds" + "Units of mutual funds" + "Commercial Paper" + "Others"
"Cash and Bank Balances" = "Cash in Hand" + "Deposits with Banks"

"Other current assets" = "Trade receivables" + "Cash equivalents" + "Short-term loans and advances" + "Interest Accrued on Loans & Advances" + "Prepaid expenses and Other Intangible assets" + "Security Deposits" + "Others"
"Total assets" = "Loans & Advances" + "Investments Profile"+ " Cash and Bank Balances" + "Other current assets" + "Premises & Fixed Assets" + "Miscellaneous expenditure" + "Profit and Loss Account"
"Total Financial Assets" = "Loans & Advances" + "Investments Profile"
"Income from Financial Business" = "Fund-Based Income" + "Fee-Based Income" + "Miscellaneous income"
"Fund-Based Income" = "Interest Income" + "Investment Income" + "Profit on Sale of Investments" + "Other fund-based income"
"Interest Income" = "Interest on Inter-corporate Deposits" + "Interest on Other Loans"
"Investment Income" = "Interest" + "Dividends"

"Fee-Based Income" = "One time Registration Charges" + "Documentation Charges" + "Order Matching Charges" + "Fee Earned from Lenders" + "Fee Earned from Borrowers" + "Recovery Fees" + "Other Fee Based Income"
"Total Income" = "Income from Financial Business" + "Income from Non-Financial Business"
"Interest Expense and other financing cost" = "Interest on Inter-corporate Deposits" + "Interest on credits from Banks" + "Interest on credits from Financial Institutions" + "Other Financing Charges"
"Operating Expenses" = "Employee Costs" + "Other Administrative Costs"

"Total expenses" = "Depreciation on Fixed Assets including Leased Assets" + "Interest Expense and other financing cost" + "Brokerage" + "Discount/charges on Bills rediscounted" + "Loss on Sale of Investments" + "Diminution in value of investments" + "Operating Expenses"
"Profit before Tax" = "Total Income" + "Total expenses"
"Net Profit/Loss" = "Profit before Tax" - "Provision for taxation"

"Total" = "Paid-up Equity Capital" + "Preference shares to be compulsorily convertible into equity" + "Perpetual Debt Instrument ( Not to exceed 15% of Aggregate Tier I Capital as on March 31 of the previous year) + "Free reserves"
"Total deductions to equity capital" = "Accumulated balance of loss" + "Deferred Revenue Expenditure" + "Deferred Tax Assets (Net)" + "Other Intangible Assets"
"Owned fund" = "total of capital and free reserves" - "Total of deductions to equity capital"

"Total adjustments to calculate net owned funds" = "Investment in shares of ("Subsidiaries" + "Companies in the same Group" + "Wholly Owned Subsidiaries" + " Other non-banking financial companies") + "The book value of debentures, bonds, outstanding loans and advances, bills purchased and discounted (including hire-purchase and lease finance) made to, and deposits with ("Subsidiaries" + "Companies in the same Group" + "Wholly Owned Subsidiaries" + " Other non-banking financial companies")

Reporting of "Regulatory adjustments" is to be calculated using formula [if(owned funds <0) then (regulatory adjustments = total adjustments to calculate net owned funds) else (regulatory adjustments = (max(total adjustments to calculate net owned funds - (0.1* owned funds)),0))].

Reporting of "Net owned fund"is to be calculated using the formula [if(owned funds <0) then (Net owned fund = Total adjustments to calculate net owned funds subtracted from Owned Fund) else (Net owned fund = Regulatory adjustments subtracted from Owned Fund))]

va:valueAssertion.test: if ($V5 > 0) then round(($V1),2) = round((($V2 + $V3 + $V4) div $V5),2) else ($V1 =0)

generic:link.msg:message: "Leverage Ratio" = ("Secured Borrowings" + "Un-Secured Borrowings" + "Current liabilities") / ("Owned Fund")
Value of "Paid-up Equity Capital" in DNBS14PART4 = Value of "Ordinary Shares" in DNBS14PART1
Value of "Preference shares to be compulsorily convertible into equity" in DNBS14PART4 = Value of "Cumulative Convertible Preference Shares’ in DNBS14PART1
Value of "General Reserves" in PART4 = Value of "General Reserves" in PART1]
Value of "Statutory / Spl. Reserve U/S 45 IC of RBI Act, 1934" in DNBS14PART4 = Value of "Statutory/Special Reserve (Section 45-IC reserve to be shown separately below item no.(vi))" in DNBS14PART1
Value of "Share Premium" in DNBS14PART4 = Value of "Share Premium" in DNBS14PART1
Value of "Debenture Redemption Reserve" in DNBS14PART4 = Value of "Debenture Redemption Reserve" in DNBS14PART1
Value of "Accumulated balance of loss" in DNBS14PART4 = Value of "Profit and Loss Account (Accumulated Loss)" in DNBS14PART2

"Total Number of Complaints Outstanding at the end of Quarter" = "Total Number of Complaints Outstanding at the end of Previous Quarter" + "Number of new complaints received during Quarter" - "Number of Complaints Disposed-Off during the Quarter’

"Total Number of Complaints Outstanding at the end of Quarter" = "Total Number of Complaints Outstanding at the end of Previous Quarter" + "Number of new complaints received during Quarter" - "Number of Complaints Disposed-Off during the Quarter’
"Total Non-Performing Assets Amount" = "Overdue more than 90 days" + "Doubtful 1 Category" + "Doubtful 2 Category" + "Loss Asset"
"Total Assets" = "Total Standard Assets Amount" + "Total Non-Performing Assets Amount"
"Equity shares" = "Foreign Institutional Investors" + "Foreign Direct Investment"
"Total Amount from Foreign Sources" = "Equity shares" + "Borrowings" + "Bonds/Debentures" + "Others"
"Total Amount of Overdue" = "Overdue Upto 30 days" + "Overdue for 31 to 60 days" + "Overdue for 61 to 90 days" + "Overdue for 91 days & above"
"Total Number of Accounts" = "Overdue Upto 30 days" + "Overdue for 31 to 60 days" + "Overdue for 61 to 90 days" + "Overdue for 91 days & above"
Value of "Total Assets" in sheet DNBS14PART2 = Value of "Total Liabilities" in DNBS14PART1
"Percentage shareholding" should be less than or equal to 100% and greater than or equal to 1%
The PAN entered is invalid. Please enter a valid PAN otherwise enter NA.
"Date of registration of the lender in the platform" must be less than equal to "reporting end date"
"Date of registration of the borrower in the platform" must be less than equal to "reporting end date"
"Exposure Outstanding of Lend Amount" must be equal to sum of it child elements
"Total Outstanding of Borrowed Amount" must be equal to sum of it child elements
"Total debit summations in lender escrow account during the quarter" must be equal to sum of it child elements
"Total credit summations in lender escrow account during the quarter" must be equal to sum of it child elements
"Total balance in lender escrow account as on date" must be equal to sum of it child elements
"Total debit summations in borrower escrow account during the quarter" must be equal to sum of it child elements
"Total credit summations in borrower escrow account during the quarter" must be equal to sum of it child elements
"Total balance in borrower escrow account as on date" must be equal to sum of it child elements
Reporting of "Remark is mandatory
"Premises & Fixed Assets" = "Fixed assets" + "Assets Acquired in Satisfaction of Claims"
"Gross NPAs percentage" = ("Total NPAs" * 100) / ("Total Assets")
